amendment.description: To clarify teh prohibition on contracting with foreign incorporated entities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3620 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3620 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S9119-9120; text: CR S9119) To clarify teh prohibition on contracting with foreign incorporated entities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3620 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
